function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemics with severe health consequences and significant economic downturn have a statistically significant impact on robot usage.","Impact":"Increased risk of pandemic transmission leading to high morbidity and mortality rates, as well as economic downturn.","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and economic stimulus policies to reduce the impact of pandemics.","Technologies":"Advanced robotics for automation of tasks in high-risk environments, AI for public health monitoring and prediction.","People":"Population at risk of higher morbidity and mortality, as well as individuals and workers in industries affected by economic downturn.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, robotics and AI developers, policymakers."}]}
